import React,{createContext,useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const AuthContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const AuthProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization']="Bearer ".concat(token);// You might want to verify the token with the backend here
